                  throws OutOfSpaceException
        Appends data to the tail (end) of the log.
        Specified by:
        append in interface ILog
        Parameters:
        data - The object to append to tail of the log.
        Returns:
        A timestamp representing the address the data was written to.
        Throws:
        OutOfSpaceException - If there is no space remaining on the log.

      • read

        public Object read(ITimestamp address)
            throws UnwrittenException,
                   TrimmedException,
                   ClassNotFoundException,
                   IOException
        Reads data from an address in the log.
        Specified by:
        read in interface ILog
        Parameters:
        address - A timestamp representing the location to read from.
        Returns:
        The object at that address.
        Throws:
        UnwrittenException - If the address was unwritten.
        TrimmedException - If the address has been trimmed.
        ClassNotFoundException
        IOException

        Specified by:
